casebody.data:
PITTS
v.
NASH DAY HOSPITAL. No. 22A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2005. Barry S. Cobb, James T. Newman, Jr., Raleigh, for Harris, Wilson & OB-GYN Asso. Charles S. Rountree, Tarboro, Charles Albert, for Jennifer L. Pitts. James W. Williams, Anne W. Ford, Asheville, for North Carolina Association of Defense Attorneys.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of April 2005 by N.C. Academy of Trial Lawyers for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of April 2005."
